00016 // INCLUDE FILES
00017 #include "clientimagecommander.h"
00018 
00019 // ============================ MEMBER FUNCTIONS ===============================
00020 
00021 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00022 // RImageCommander::RImageCommander()
00023 // Create a new animation object.
00024 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00025 //
00026 EXPORT_C RImageCommander::RImageCommander( RAnimDll &aAnimDll ) :
00027                                                               RAnim( aAnimDll )
00028     {
00029     // No implementation required
00030     }
00031 
00032 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00033 // RImageCommander::ImageConstruct()
00034 // Construct a new animation object.
00035 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00036 //
00037 EXPORT_C void RImageCommander::ImageConstruct( const RWindowBase& aDevice,
00038                                              TInt aType, const TDesC8& aParams )
00039     {
00040     // Send the parameters to the animation server object construction
00041     RAnim::Construct( aDevice, aType, aParams );
00042     }
00043 
00044 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00045 // RImageCommander::ImageCommand()
00046 // Send a command (aCommand) to the animation server object.
00047 // Because there is no way to return an error from the server side using this
00048 // method, it is important that any server side code for these commands should
00049 // not be able to fail or leave.  If the operation can fail, then the method
00050 // TInt CommandReply(TInt aOpcode) should be used instead
00051 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00052 //
00053 EXPORT_C void RImageCommander::ImageCommand( TInt aCommand )
00054     {
00055     // Could optionally decode the commands here
00056     RAnim::Command( aCommand );
00057     }
00058 
00059 // End of File
